feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit consistent use of hyphens, commas, and other punctuation marks.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the texts were written by the same author.
